businesses.name: Appleye Jewellery Designs
businesses.business_details:
For 15 years Appleye Jewellery Designs have been using traditional Metal smith methods to create original designs inspired by their South Coast surrounds.

Creating by hand, pieces are created slowly,  that can never be replicated. Creating pieces that appeal to people who love organic form and textured aesthetics.  Appleye offers their customers original pieces that are lasting and special.

Sourcing fine recycled, refined metals from Australian suppliers. Each piece is ethically created by hand in their South Coast studio. Working closely with cutters the designs feature beautiful stones including natural opals and raw gems in many of their unique pieces.
businesses.product_details: For now our silver smith workshops have been put on hold but usually we run those every other weekend. They are a great source of creative outlet of a wonderful way to spend a birthday or just get started on the creative journey of being a silver smith.
businesses.new_products:
- All our handmade designs can now be found on our online store.
- Alt postage available if buying for a gift
- Free gift wrapping and personal handwritten card option.
- Free Postage Australia wide.
- All our products are designed and made on the South Coast of Australia.
businesses.headline: Beautiful unique jewellery handmade in Australia using recycled fine metals and ethically sourced gemstones
